attributes.action: Stop animal cruelty , why have one if ur gonna mistreat it
attributes.background: I hear about this all the time and it's sicking to me because I am very fond of animals and I think just because they are a animal they shouldn't be abused

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/174647
